name: Epidemic Simulator (Fire_Ball_MC)
description:
Epidemic Simulator is like the name suggests an simulator to simulate an epidemic. You can Change the parameters of the simulation and look at the graph in the background. The executable schould work for windows, linux and mac although i only tested it on Windows. Feel free to leave a comment :)

This simulator is inspired by Grant Sanderson's great work on: https://www.3blue1brown.com/
